fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Fire a brimstone laser at a player within range, disintegrating their will and attacking them
-(Familiar) Fire a brimstone laser at someone, setting their natural defense to one tier lower for the night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-As a familiar, you have no defense.
-If someone kills you in your familiar form, deal a basic attack to one random visitor
Damage: 2 (Powerful)
Range: 2
Luck: 0%

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who try to stop you
